required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Assess Pharmacokinetic Profiles of LY03003 and Neupro
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-Label, Crossover Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetic Profiles of Rotigotine After a Single Dose of LY03003 (28 mg) Versus After a Week of Daily NEUPRO® Transdermal Patch (4 mg Every 24 Hours) in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: Phase 1, single center study to assess pharmacokinetic profiles of rotigotine after single dose of LY03003 and daily patch application of Neupro in Healthy Volunteers

intervention.description: LY03003 (rotigotine extended release microspheres for intramuscular [IM] injection)
